section.p:
Test Management System (TMS) currently caters to two types of users:
TM Users
Admin users
The majority of admin specific functionality can be accessed via the administrator page.
To access this page, login and select the 'Admin' option from the user menu.
User Access allows the current administrator to assign a non admin user administrator permissions.

ul.li: Add button underneath the name field will add the user
Delete button on the table will remove the user

section.p: Admin have the ability to add/edit a Product in TMS. Both the Name and External Id are mandatory fields.

ul.li: Add button underneath the name field will add the product
To Edit click on the product you wish to edit, then fill in the fields and click the edit button
Refresh button on the table will refresh the list of products
Delete button on the table will remove the product

section.p: Admin have the ability to add/edit a Feature in TMS. Both the Product and Feature Name must be specified.

ul.li: Add button underneath the name field will add the feature
To Edit click on the feature you wish to edit, then fill in the fields and click the edit button
Delete button on the table will remove the feature

section.p: Admin can add/edit a component in TMS by specifying the Product, Feature and Component names.

ul.li: Add button underneath the name field will add the Component
To Edit click on the component you wish to edit, then fill in the name field and click the edit button
Delete button on the table will remove the Component.

section.p: Admin have the ability to add/edit a Test Type in TMS. Both the Product and Test Type must be specified.

ul.li: Add button underneath the name field will add the Test Type
To Edit click on the Test Type you wish to edit, then fill in the name field and click the edit button
Delete button on the table will remove the Test Type.

section.p: Admin have the ability to add/edit a Group in TMS. This group is used to pool test cases together.Both the Product and Group Name must be specified.

ul.li: Add button underneath the name field will add the Group
To Edit click on the Group you wish to edit, then fill in the name field and click the edit button
Delete button on the table will remove the Group.

section.p: Admin have the ability to add/edit a Review Group in TMS. This group contains a collection of users who can carry out a review on any test case to which the group are assigned. Both the name of the user you wish to add and the group to which you want to add the user must be specified.

ul.li: Add button underneath the name field will add the Review Group
Delete button on the review group table will remove the Review Group.
Delete button on the user table will remove the user from the selected Review Group.
Edit option is given when you select a group form the review group table and you can add more members to it or change the group name.

section.p: Admin have the ability to add/edit a Project to TMS. The Product, Project Name and External Id must be specified.

ul.li: Add button underneath the name field will add the Project
To Edit click on the Project you wish to edit, then fill in the fields and click the edit button
Delete button on the table will remove the Project.

section.p: Admin have the ability to add/edit a Team in TMS.The Product, Feature and Team Name must be specified.

ul.li: Add button underneath the name field will add the Team
To Edit click on the Team you wish to edit, then fill in the team name field and click the edit button
Delete button on the table will remove the Team.

section.p: Admin have the ability to add/edit a Test Suite to TMS.The Product, Feature and Suite Name must be specified.
section.b: What is the difference between test suite and group ?

ul.li: Add button underneath the name field will add the Team
To Edit click on the Suite you wish to edit, then fill in the suite name field and click the edit button
Delete button on the table will remove the Team.

section.p: Admin have the ability to add/edit a Test Campaign Group to TMS. The Product and Test Campaign Name must be specified.

ul.li: Add button underneath the name field will add the Test Campaign Gtoup
Delete button on the table will remove the Test Campaign Group.
To Edit click on the Test Campaign Group you wish to edit, then fill in the name field and click the edit button

section.p: Admin have the ability to add a Drop to a Product in TMS. The Product and Drop must be specified.

ul.li: Add button underneath the name field will add the Drop

title.b: Ability to delete a test Case

section.p: Admin can remove a test case in TMS by following the steps outlined below

ul.li: Login
Navigate to 'Select a test Case' and open the test case you wish to delete
Click on delete to remove the test case and click 'Remove' on the prompt to confirm the deletion
